document_title: Vestibular disorders: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content:
Vestibular disorders can cause dangerous complications such as:
8.1. Easily depressed
Depression is increasingly common, one of the main reasons is that when suffering from it, most patients experience dizziness, vertigo, nausea, cannot stand and have difficulty living, which makes them feel tired, depressed, lost.
8.2. Easy to fall
When headaches, dizziness, and loss of balance suddenly recur, especially when waking up at night, driving a vehicle or working at height, they can cause dangerous accidents. for yourself and those around you.
8.3. Risk of stroke and accident
Patients may be bedridden or even die
If the cause of the vestibular disorder is due to the cerebrovascular system, the risk of true stroke or recurrence is high, so appropriate diagnosis and treatment is needed.
